# npm-run

### Run locally-installed executables.

Any executable available to an npm lifecycle script is available to `npm-run`.

## Installation

```bash
> npm install -g npm-run
```

## Usage

```bash
> npm install mocha
> npm-run mocha test/*
# uses local mocha executable
```
